thread.title: colin vale
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by colin vale

author: colin vale
title: colin vale
text: A friend suggested Solar Quote: s as the go to company to go to if you wanted an impartial understanding about solar installation and to obtain three Quote: s. Life's experiences have taught me to mistrust and be skeptical and the old saying "That if it seems to good to be true, then it probably is" Well my pessimism has been dealt a blow and faith has been restored with Solar Quote: s! I received three separate Quote: s to have solar installed and all were very professional and informative. Once I had the Quote: s I had a few questions and ran them via Solar Quote: s and had answers within a day. I also used the Solar Quote: s site to gain a greater understanding as to the current pricing and technology around etc. It gave me a lot of confidence when dealing with the three companies that Quote: d. I don't know how Solar Quote: s makes their income but their service is fist rate and it's refreshing that such companies exist. Fantastic 5 star service!
